app.title: Secure QR Link Scanner
scan.select.title: Select Scan Type
scan.select.subtitle: Choose what to scan and start a secure analysis.
scan.code.description: Scan and verify QR/Barcodes with camera.
placeholder_text: Enter text or a URL above; your QR code will be generated automatically.
info_text: QR codes can contain URLs, text, phone numbers, email addresses, and more. Up to 2,953 characters are supported.
qr_generation_error: Could not generate the QR code. Please try again.
scan.image.description: Scan codes from a selected photo.
scan.info.title: Information
scan.info.description: The app analyzes QR codes and links on-device. Results are heuristic and may not be definitive.
history.title: History
settings.title: Settings
consent.title: User Consent
consent.message: This app analyzes links and QR codes locally. Results are heuristic and may not be definitive. By proceeding, you accept the disclaimer and consent to scanning.
classifier.brandMismatchWarning: Brand keyword does not match domain
disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
scan.footer.text: All scans are processed on your device; no data is shared.
download_unavailable_detail: Saving an image requires an extra module. It works on Web; on native we can add SVG/extra module support.
